channel.title: Auto donation command
channel.description:
Okay so i'm trying to make after the player hits ::claim their account will be given these - playerRights = 6 & isDonator = 1. I have a picture of my code, and want to see if I'm doing something wrong. Current code - http://prntscr.com/6uujv9
**Using RspsData Auto donation system

item.title: Auto donation command
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

I am pretty sure you did it wrong. Just because of the way “i” is used in the loop and playerIndex.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto donation command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s no way to really be sure with what little you have provided (As you keep seeming to do).

The sure fire way to know? Test it out.

Add an entry to your phpMyAdmin with your account name and the donation id. Then log into the game and test the command.

Read full topic
